about_the_game:
The protagonist of this game, Zhang Yu, was once a super lawyer known for his unparalleled professional abilities and 100% win rate. However, after winning a lawsuit, he unfortunately died due to extreme retaliation from the opposing lawyer. The divine system has selected Zhang Yu and given him the opportunity to be reborn, allowing him to take over the body of an unlucky lawyer known as the 'sent to prison'. This lawyer gained a notorious reputation from his debut for continuously sending clients to prison.

After being reborn, Zhang Yu faced various embarrassing situations such as hunger, ridicule from thousands of people, rejection from peers, and the departure of his girlfriend. With pockets cleaner than his face, he couldn't even afford a simple meal.

In games, readers are not just bystanders, but also drivers of story development. Players can:

Decision making critical moments: In critical courtroom debates and negotiations, the player's choices will directly affect the outcome of the case, and even alter the fate of the character. Each choice will affect the development of the subsequent plot.

Impact on interpersonal relationships: Through different dialogue options, players can help Zhang Yu repair his relationship with his ex girlfriend or establish connections with other important characters.

The protagonist, with the help of the divine system and strong professional abilities, turned the tide and became a legendary figure, gradually gaining fame, wealth, and love.

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content with normal sexual behavior appears in the game
